attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Any expense might be business if you sell you life story.
Direct taxation of income and capital is more realistic.
People with a persona avoid VAT now without sufficient checks.
It is preferable to move not to directly tax transactions, particularly as that is not progressive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
